definition: (used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
in a short while/all at once/all of a sudden
erhua variant of 一下[yi1 xia4]
to wait a moment/later/in awhile
erhua variant of 等一下[deng3 yi1 xia4]

sentences.english: Don't eat up at one and you can have it after a while.
sentences.chinese: 别一下子全吃了，留一点过会儿再吃。

sentences.english: By the way, the number of the telephone on your desk is extension 506.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说一下，你桌上的电话号码是分机506。

sentences.english: How about tidying up a bit in the sitting-room ?
sentences.chinese: 把起居室稍微打扫一下怎么样？

sentences.english: She clicks on the link to the registration form and begins entering her information.
sentences.chinese: 她在登记表的连接处点击一下，开始进入她的信息。

sentences.english: I think I need an ice-cream to chill out.
sentences.chinese: 我想吃支冰淇淋放松一下。

sentences.english: Yes, I would like to help you carry these bags.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我愿意帮你拿一下这些包。

sentences.english: The night watchman brought the armchair for Hewson. He tried to make him laugh.
sentences.chinese: 守夜人给休森搬来了一张椅子，顺便逗一下他。

sentences.english: "I would suggest they got a cholesterol test with these symptoms, " says Smith.
sentences.chinese: 有这此症状的人，我会建议他们去检查一下胆固醇。

sentences.english: She tilted her face to kiss me quickly on the chin.
sentences.chinese: 她侧过脸飞快地在我下巴上亲了一下。

sentences.english: If flexibility isn’t your strong suit, simply bend your knees to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的躯体不够灵活，可以弯曲膝部来调整一下。

sentences.english: My system is whatever's inside the box.
The wounded soldier opened his eyes once, but lost consciousness again immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那个伤员睁了一下眼晴随即又昏了过去。

sentences.english: Felton has to be looking over his shoulder after the Bobcats made a strong play for T.
sentences.chinese: 费尔顿得好好思量一下，毕竟夏天山猫向T。

sentences.english: The arrow with Hydra’s blood shot through Nemean’s heart.
sentences.chinese: 那浸着许的毒血的箭一下子射进了阿尼破碎的心。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss the price of Indonesian Beige materials of your company.
sentences.chinese: 想跟您商量一下贵公司印尼米黄荒料的价格。

sentences.english: Well, hold on one wee second, please?

definition: (onom.) smack!
(modal particle indicating suggestion or surmise)/...right?/...OK?/...I presume.
bar (loanword) (serving drinks, or providing Internet access etc)/to puff (on a pipe etc)/(onom.) bang/abbr. for 貼吧|贴吧[tie1 ba1]
to take a look at/to examine/to survey/(coll.) pretty soon
early/prior/former/in advance/first
below/under/next/the following/also pr. [xia4 mian5]
to boil noodles
well/carefully/nicely/properly
conveniently/in passing/without much extra effort
a little bit
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
everyone/influential family/great expert
to have a look
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)
after/then (afterwards)/after that/afterwards
to say sth
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
there is no harm in/might as well
